channel.title: the next generation on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in the next generation on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LOG 1.11: Light jackets and Programing
item.description: 13th March, 2011 Hi Everyone ðŸ™‚ We are halfway through March and temperatures are now ranging between 7-13! Quite warm (relatively) and it is now ok to venture out with either a light jacket with a heavy-ish sweater or with only one heavy jacket on.

item.title: Android body vs Human body
item.description: A lot of futuristic science fiction puts forward several ideas of what an android would be like. Data from Star Trek (TNG) is an intriguing character who tries very hard to understand what it is to be human.
